title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5702.1 - Regulation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5702.1 - Regulation

State Regulations

No vehicle transporting radioactive materials shall be
permitted to use the facilities unless the provisions of the St. Lawrence

County local law No. 10 of 1980, regulating the transportation of radioactive
materials through St. Lawrence County, shall be fully satisfied and a valid
certificate of emergency transport issued for the shipment, if
applicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5702.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
